long_description: Great for climbing, yoga and other outdoor activities, the stylish prAna Mojo shorts are durable, comfortable and designed to provide unrestricted movement. Lightweight polyester fabric feels soft against skin, wicks moisture and dries quickly. Elastic waistband feels comfortable against skin. Fabric resists wrinkles and protects skin from UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. Generous fit, long inseam and diamond gusseted crotch allow freedom of movement. 2 on-seam mesh-lined pockets; single rear cargo pocket. The prAna Mojo shorts offer a relaxed fit.
short_description: Great for climbing, yoga and other outdoor activities, the stylish prAna Mojo shorts are durable, comfortable and designed to provide unrestricted movement.
